item.description: View this post on Instagram Hike up Secret Canyon in the Pine Creek Wilderness. #secretcanyon #secretcanyontrail #pinecreekwilderness #espinosatrail #cortemadera #pinecreek #hike #hiker #12miles #leguin #lefthandofdarkness #readingwhilehiking

item.title: In the Pinyons, in the Pinyons
item.description: Pi√±on trees are an ancient food source in the American Southwest, a smaller, shrubbier tree than other pines. I have never paid them much attention, but on a recent Jeep expedition past Pinyon Mountain toward Split Rock, I had an opportunity to see them as characteristic standard-bearers of that beautiful ecotone shift from chapparal to the ridges of the Colorado Desert and the desolation of the Carrizo Badlands.
